name: Korvux - Chapter 1
description: Welcome to the Korvux kingdom. A fantasy world that is controlled by the Korvux clan. Today is the day where you apply for a membership, but not everything turns out as you hoped.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
